852610.name: Space of one Drama
852610.description:
Space of one Drama is an unusual puzzle-adventure game with action elements.

The main character and a little boy are on an extraordinary adventure in a mysterious theater of the imagination. Face various puzzles and use costumes with special abilities to defeat the guardians of the theater!

Play as, among others, a wizard with power over a levitating anvil, or an astronaut with a jet pack. By skillfully using the costumes and props, you will be able to solve the mystery of the grand theater.



  • Logical puzzles with action elements
  • Great clashes with guardians of the theater
  • Variety of costumes with special abilities
  • A story told on the stages of a mysterious theater
  • Full controller suport
  • New trailer coming soon (the current one is from the pre-alpha version)
